1.0.name: wordpress/cw-author-info
1.0.description:
Add a box with information about the author of each post after post written by that author. This box will display information in bio of each writer's blog, a link to every post written by this author, avatar, and a series of icons link to author profile on social networks are known as Facebooks, Twitter, Google+ and icon for contact by email.

All these data the author of this post are collected from the profile of each author which have incorporated the necessary fields to fill. Author Info also has a widget in which appear a list of all components of the blog who have permission to write to the blog. This widget also displays the avatar of the author, his name with a link to a list of all posts written by him, the same icons to link to your profile on social networks and the number of written post. The box appears with the author's information after each post is configurableboth in its background color, the color of the lettering and decorative border color of the table
